body:
I have a question regarding naming conventions for the IoctlXXX functions.

In the case of socket options, we have SetSockOptInt and GetSockOptInt so we know the difference between setting and getting an option.

For Ioctl, should I do the same thing and have SetIoctlInt and GetIoctlInt functions?

For my immediate needs, I would need Int, Termios, and Winsize versions of ioctl.  Should I implement others?
